valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 2 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Wed 3 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Low Faeroes 982 losing its identity. New lows expected Wales 988 and northwest of Bailey 986 by 0600 tomorrow
